_header: Fetys bel chere / Drink to thy fere
_description: A macaronic drinking song in Latin, English, and French — six lines

BodArcSelB26.Transcription:
Verbum caro factum estEt habitauit in nobisFetys bel
                        cheredrynk to þi fereVesse lebauere & synge nou
                    well
